name: Art Attack
storyline: Paper, a 15 year old art academy student, has a special gift. She can bring her drawings to life. One day while showing one of her living artworks at an exhibit, Paper begins to feel sad and frustrated that her work isn't being received well. She was just about to take her artwork home and leave the exhibit, when suddenly a strange vortex appears and transports Paper and her friends into a strange new world. It's up to you, the player, to help Paper fight her way back home!
summary: Art Attack is a 2D side scrolling shoot-em-up with gameplay inspired by Gradius, Silver Surfer, and Cuphead. The aesthetic of each level is based on a different artist or art movement from history.
